sentence: The fact that this hotel have a private beach is definitely a plus
The restaurant has an open air setting again with a nice ocean view
the guys on the beach were extremely helpful getting beds and towels ready free ice lollies and ice towels
BUT the private beach area was nice and the food was pretty good
Pool Beach Quiet rooms Finish up the construction
The beach is quite lovely and very swimable
Very Nice Beach Hotel
The beach seating ran out of umbrellas and towels
Ocean View room was a palm tree and pool view
Clean rooms and great view of the beach
Whenever one books a vacation resort on the beach
Oh and the best part is the booking was listed as ocean view but instead we were looking at a tree
From Mr Kip on Pool Beach duty
Beach is only fair but you do not go to Key West for beaches
One of the other rooms also face the ocean had a balcony
Diamond member and been coming here for 3 years because in the beach
I had booked an ocean view suite at 80 per night and one the way there our concern started
I l skip the general smell that apparently emanates from the sea seeds stacked on the hotel beach shore
Property claims to have best beach on island
We planned on spending a couple days here and thought it ’d be best to book here at the Waldorf with “ the only natural beach in Key West ”
Besides EJ shout out to Jese down at the beach cool dude always making sure we were setup at the beach or pool
Understandable that the can not do nothing in regards to the mountain of seaweed
But they do say only beach with white sand
In simple words unles they make changes to provide better access to beach and maintain the rooms well I do nt think I will ever come and stay here
The beach did have some seaweed but the staff went above and beyond to keep the beach as clean as possible
We could see the ocean through the tops of palm trees but the real view was of the pool and courtyard which was very nice

Other issues we had Our luggage was sent to the wrong rom Christmas music playing 24hr a day which you could hear at night when you are trying to slep the lobby smelled like cat urine One working elevator Construction noise On a positive note the hotel is beautiful the staff is pleasant and the beach is peaceful

There were just so many things wrong with the actual property that was just remodeled Tons of missed paint spots Elevator did not always work Staff were very apathetic really did not care about guests Even the games on the lawn were all missing pieces so you could not play them No activities Beach staff were non exisistant The Barefoot Billys beach staff did not know how to use the equipment you rent Electrical boxes in the hallways were always left open Housekeeping did not really clean the rooms
You get nothing but a bed and a nice beach
Advertised as an OceanView room and paid for it and it was really a view of parking garage with a sliver of Ocean
One of the only spots you can find a beach in Key West
If you want to pay a bunch of money for a nice beach and pool this is the place
The service on the beach and the pool need improvement
This is a big draw since most of the resorts only have pools or beach chairs on decks docks with no sand or beach access
We do think the beach drink and food service needs to be stepped up
There are many excellent alternative like Louies or a throwback bar on the beach with great food or Duval street
